sum_lennardjones.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ===================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              SUM_LENNARD-JONES
00004 !
00005 !   Calculate Lennard-Jones forces of particle from interaction list
00006 !
00007 !  ===================================================================
00008 
00009 subroutine sum_lennardjones( p, n, inode, eps, sumfx, sumfy, sumfz, sumphi )
00010 
00011   use treevars
00012   implicit none
00013   integer, intent(in) :: p  ! particle number
00014   integer, intent(in) :: n  !  # terms on interaction list
00015   integer, dimension(1:n) ::  inode
00016   real, intent(in) :: eps
00017   integer :: jnode, i
00018 
00019   real*8, intent(out) ::  sumfx,sumfy,sumfz,sumphi 
00020   real*8 :: a_bond, d2, d, dlj2, dlj, flj, epsc, plj, dx, dy, dz
00021 
00022 
00023   epsc = .3 ! cutoff (norm to eps)
00024   a_bond=eps
00025   sumfx = 0
00026   sumfy = 0
00027   sumfz = 0
00028   sumphi = 0
00029 
00030   do i=1,n
00031 
00032      !  preprocess distances
00033      jnode = inode(i)
00034      dx =  x(p) - xcoc( jnode ) 
00035      dy =  y(p) - ycoc( jnode ) 
00036      dz =  z(p) - zcoc( jnode ) 
00037 
00038      d2 = dx**2+dy**2+dz**2
00039      d = sqrt(d2) 
00040      dlj = d/a_bond
00041 
00042      if (dlj >= epsc) then 
00043        plj = 4*(1./dlj**12 - 1./dlj**6)
00044        flj = 24./a_bond*(2./dlj**13 - 1./dlj**7)
00045 !     else if (dlj >= 0.5) then
00046 !       plj = 48./pi*cos(pi*dlj/2.) 
00047  !      flj = 24./a_bond*sin(pi*dlj/2.)
00048      else
00049        plj = 4*(1./epsc**12-1./epsc**6) 
00050        flj = 24./a_bond*(2./epsc**13-1/epsc**7 )
00051      endif
00052      !   natoms = abs_charge( jnode) / qi    ! # particles in monopole cluster
00053 
00054 
00055      ! potential
00056      sumphi = sumphi + plj
00057 
00058      !  forces
00059 
00060      sumfx = sumfx + dx/d*flj
00061 
00062      sumfy = sumfy + dy/d*flj
00063 
00064      sumfz = sumfz + dz/d*flj
00065 
00066 
00067   end do
00068 
00069 
00070 end subroutine sum_lennardjones
